newsitem.title: JAPAN: Tokyo stocks end modestly lower after trade data.
newsitem.headline: Tokyo stocks end modestly lower after trade data.

text.p: Tokyo stocks closed down on Wednesday, but losses were limited as the dollar/yen rate did not react much to the big rise in Japan's trade surplus for May, brokers said.
But turnover remained light, as participants were cautious ahead of the Group of Seven (G7) nations' summit meeting in Denver on June 20-22, they said.
The 225-share Nikkei average lost 95.81 points or 0.47 percent to close at 20,497.85. It traded in a range of 20,428.74 and 20,620.36.
